TextLibrary.Text: PEZT
We received your distress call. Please identify yourself.
We received your distress call. Please identify yourself.
I am Pezt of Jahrwox. Pirates not far behind. Please help. I will pay... well.
I am Pezt of Jahrwox. Pirates not far behind. Please help. I will pay... well.
Not a Jahrwoxi, kid. You help those little rats at your own peril.
Not a Jahrwoxi, kid. You help those little rats at your own peril.
We can't very well leave him to be shot down...
We can't very well leave him to be shot down...
It's on your head, kid. At least see what you can get from him. He's a Jahrwoxi, he'd feel cheated if there was no haggling involved.
It's on your head, kid. At least see what you can get from him. He's a Jahrwoxi, he'd feel cheated if there was no haggling involved.
Very well, what's it worth to you, Pezt?
Very well, what's it worth to you, Pezt?
Pezt give you 500 Credit. It is all Pezt owns.
Pezt give you 500 Credit. It is all Pezt owns.
Apart from your ship...
Apart from your ship...
Look at Pezt ship. Not worth much.
Look at Pezt ship. Not worth much.
What do you know about a battle between a Trident ship and a shuttle a few days ago?
What do you know about a battle between a Trident ship and a shuttle a few days ago?
You help Pezt. Pezt tell you all about the battle.
You help Pezt. Pezt tell you all about the battle.
Done!
Done!
